title: The area of staff quarters for various categories of employees shall be as per the norms prescribed by the concerned User Authority and in no case, shall the area of Staff Quarters exceed the maximum limit of carpet area as prescribed therein
clause_text: The area of staff quarters for various categories of employees shall be as per the norms prescribed by the concerned User Authority and in no case, shall the area of Staff Quarters exceed the maximum limit of carpet area as prescribed therein.
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:
